item.tinkers_jewelry_ex.bracelet.descrip: Bracelets are simple trinkets that grant effects based on the used gem.
item.tinkers_jewelry_ex.chain.descriptio: Chains are are parts of Charms and Necklaces.
item.tinkers_jewelry_ex.charm.descriptio: Charms are simple trinkets that grant effects based on the used gem.
item.tinkers_jewelry_ex.crown.descriptio: Crowns are simple trinkets that grant effects based on the used gem.
item.tinkers_jewelry_ex.curved_plate.des: Curved Plates are parts of Bracelets, Charms, Crowns and Gloves.
item.tinkers_jewelry_ex.glove.descriptio: Gloves are simple trinkets that grant effects based on the used gem.
item.tinkers_jewelry_ex.necklace.descrip: Necklaces are simple trinkets that grant effects based on the used gem.
